title: [BUG]Unable to connect to Redis at 127.0.0.1:6379.
body:
i an running a RL project which involves the redis package in the PycharmIDE and such error occured "RuntimeError: Unable to connect to Redis at 127.0.0.1:6379.". Besides, errors involving "auth" and "password" like "sent auth but no passport is set"also showed up.Please give me some advice.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75373793/132475989-951c4a9f-5a25-4a2d-a69e-fa98a1cfb666.png)

comments_data.body:
`sent auth but no passport is set` is just a warning and it should not affect the connection.
You can try using `redis-cli` or `telnet` to connect to redis to confirm what's wrong

> `sent auth but no passport is set` is just a warning and it should not affect the connection.
> You can try using `redis-cli` or `telnet` to connect to redis to confirm what's wrong
